text: The 1947-48 Austrian Cup was the national cup in Austrian football. Wacker Wien were the defending champions. Fußball in ÖsterreichThe 1947/48 competition was held in a new format: The winners of the local cup competitions in each federal state (with the exception of Tyrol - no cup competition - the autumn champion was named here) played a final competition for the Austrian Cup ==Qualification== ==Quarter finals== ==Semi-finals== ==Replay match Semifinals== ==Final== ==References== Category:Austrian Cup Category:1948 in Austria
title: 1947–48 Austrian Cup
